messages.title: A FULL TIME MP FOR A FULL TIME JOB
messages.content: A MAN OF ACTION NOT JUST WORDS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: All OFSTED inspectors should return to the classroom/lecture-room and teach a full timetable for two weeks every three years at the level they will be assessing.
Any future % pay increases for the next 3 years should be evenly distributed across the sector so that EVERYONE receives the same financial increase each year.
Help to solve part of the Housing crisis by compulsory purchase of the 700,000 plus empty properties around the UK and add them to the relevant Council stock.
Support the wind farm. It will bring us clean energy, jobs and new technology.

issues.environment: Support the wind farm. It will bring us clean energy, jobs and new technology.
issues.health: Any future % pay increases for the next 3 years should be evenly distributed across the sector so that EVERYONE receives the same financial increase each year.

housing.content: Help to solve part of the Housing crisis by compulsory purchase of the 700,000 plus empty properties around the UK and add them to the relevant Council stock.

images.caption: Image of Michael Plummer, the candidate.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Published and Promoted by Peter Craven on behalf of Michael Plummer (Liberal Democrats) at 36 Northbourne Avenue, Bournemouth, BH10 6DQ. Printed by The Kornit Group, 19 Woodside Road, Bournemouth, BH5 2BA.
